column4: hi i have a WUBI ubuntu install and yesterday i booted it for the first time and updated it. Today i tried to boot it but i the only thing i get is busybox
I've had the same thing, and I think it has something to do with a flag that Windows sets on NTFS when it wants to do repairs or something.
Try starting up Windows, then shutting down cleanly, then booting into Ubuntu again.
